list.description: #Daebom #Maus #anime

Nanashi Mumei

I noticed nobody had done Mumei yet, so here we go! It’s also my first time doing sights, so I hope it works. Enjoy, guys!

#anime #anime_art #animeart #animegirls #holo #hololive #mumei #vtuber

M1 Abrams from Reta's video "Stand-off". I edited the sight from orig pic abit to make her look happier.
Comes with 3 set sizes (tested for ww2 era), plus json file to edit sight. (use https://solawk.github.io/wtdraw if you dont alr know)

#anime #wtdraw #m1abrams #reta

EN: Just a Mishima Rui :D (.JSON still in zip archive)
RU: Просто Мишима Рюи :D (.JSON все еще в архиве)
#MishimaRui #Mishima_Rui #Rui #anime #bunnygirl #goonersight #wtdraw #bunny_suit

First 2 images is the variant with NO horizontal lines that is usually default on most sights, the other 2 images have the default horizontal lines if you like them
Did my best, was in a little rush since I wanted to do it today as by request from someone else in my other sight creation, hopefully acceptable.
Enjoy!
Also I will be making Maria next, possibly tomorrow so you guys can have the full Senrai Maidens sight pack<3


#anime #wtdraw #senraimaidens

Made the Galactic Empire sight. Didn't create a filled one for this one as you won't be able to see shit. Any other sight suggestions?

EN:
My first (alredy second :D) drawn sight :) (Inside the zip archive you can finde .JSON file for editing sight).
P.S: Re-uploaded because the previous post had a problem, previous post was deleted.
P.P.S: This version of Miku has less elements, so it looks a little worse.
RU:
Мой первый (уже второй (перерисовывал все с нуля) :D) нарисованый прицел :) (Внутри зипки есть .JSON файл для редактирования прицела).
П.С: Перезалив из-за ошибки в прошлом посте, прошлый пост удален.
П.П.С: В этой версии меньше элементов, по этому Мику выглядит не прям супер.
